title: Workout Logger for Programmers
description: A full stack web-based shell command line interface for tracking workout/exercise sessions.

title: Social Media Cards Mobile App
description: (IN DEVELOPMENT!) A mobile app that treats group conversations like a deck of cards.

title: Yourdle (Your + Wordle)
description: A full stack website that allows you to make *your* own version of Wordle (The NY Times)

title: Interactive Neighborhood Map
description: Interactive map of neighborhoods in District 4 of San Jose, CA. Used in San Jose's District 4 City Councilmember 2024 election.

title: Predicting Universal Studios Ratings
description: Data analysis, natural language processing, and predictive ML model on a Universal Studios customer reviews dataset.

title: Redesigning Netflix for Extended Accessibiilty
description: Based on a group case study, Netflix lacks accessibility features for those who are visually impaired. This design includes a new Settings page that offers more accessibility options for this issue.
